text:
Hi Everyone! We at Storyscript are *developing the future of programming* with the first top-level programming language. We are hiring quite a lot and looking for passionate developers who believe with strong empathy. Learn more at <https://storyscript.io> — I’m the founder of Storyscript and <http://Codecov.io|Codecov.io> — I’m here to chat :slightly_smiling_face:
Cloud-native, polyglot development, turing-complete, strong-typed programming language that is intuitive and highly-readable. The future of programming. — <https://jobs.lever.co/storyscript/> — Including *Language Engineering Job*

attachments.title: Storyscript
attachments.text: Top-level coding for seamlessly stringing microservices and functions in a serverless way.

text:
Hi Joe! I tried the Universe app. Usually I’m skeptical about GUIs that claim to make website building “easy”. But there are things I liked in Universe. For example, the domain creation and content update is abstracted away in an interesting way. The grid based layout engine is also fun to play with. 

On a more ideological note, there is much to think about how we could empower web citizens instead of walled gardens consumers.

What are you looking for exactly? What kind of additional input would you like in your team?
